subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kevin Harvick did not win many new friends as he rolled to victory in the Sylvania 300, but he dodged trouble in the first of 10 races in Nascar’s Chase for the Nextel Cup.
snippet: Kevin Harvick did not win many new friends as he rolled to victory in the Sylvania 300, but he dodged trouble in the first of 10 races in Nascar’s Chase for the Nextel Cup.
